pr_title: SONARJAVA-3423 Rule S5866: Case insensitive Unicode regular expressions should enable the “UNICODE_CASE” flag

timeline.bodyText:
be careful, in order to test the location of the issues, you need 2 opening/closing brackets! For instance:  [[sc=37,ec=61]].
I didn't check the other rule but I might have missed it, and with this PR, the precise location is not tested because of this error.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

replies.bodyText: I fixed this and also grepped through the other tests to see whether I made the same mistake elsewhere (I didn't).
replies.author: sebastian-hungerecker-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure that I saw any test case which would benefit from having a loop here and report multiple issues for a given regex. would it be possible to add a test for it?
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.message: Allow the tracking of locations of flags in regular expressions

SONARJAVA-3423 Rule S5866: Case insensitive Unicode regular ...

... expressions should enable the “UNICODE_CASE” flag
